text: Caroline Garcia and Kristina Mladenovic were the defending champions, but chose not to participate this year. Raquel Atawo and Jeļena Ostapenko won the title, defeating Abigail Spears and Katarina Srebotnik in the final, 6–4, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Main Draw Porsche Tennis Grand Prixandnbsp;- Doubles 2017 Doubles
title: 2017 Porsche Tennis Grand Prix – Doubles
